question: In which one of the following reactions, rate constant has the unit <katex>$mol~L^{-1}s^{-1}$</katex>.
choices: Decomposition of HI on the surface of Gold
explanation: The unit <katex>$mol~L^{-1}s^{-1}$</katex> corresponds to a Zero Order reaction. Decomposition of HI on gold surface is a zero order reaction.
